name: Administration
text:
All state historic areas and buildings surplus to the operations of the department of accounting and general services shall be transferred by executive order to the department, except as provided in section 6E-33.  All state projects and programs relating to historic preservation shall come under the authority of the department. [L 1976, c 104, pt of §2]
Revision Note
  Section "6E-33" substituted for "6E-73".
